sys_decision_multi_result.label: Result: Review & Enhance - It is recommended to review this feature to identify why this customization exists as opposed to using OOTB functionality. There should be a comparison between the benefit/value being provided for this feature against the risk and maintenance overhead required to keep it. If required by a business stakeholder, it may be worth ensuring they are following industry or business unit based practices, and not creating their own unique process or requirement
